persist_err:
This is an error in the app manifest.
The function (persist) must specify the parameter -dir or -file.
The function (persist) has been terminated, and the built-in option(persist) in Scoop is not affected (if it's configured)
has_shortcut:
<@Yellow>If you don't need the desktop shortcut, run the following command:
<@Magenta>scoop config abgo_bucket_no_shortcut true
no_shortcut:
<@Yellow>The current Scoop config <@Magenta>abgo_bucket_no_shortcut<@Yellow> has a value of <@Magenta>true<@Yellow>.
Desktop shortcuts are not created. If it exists, it will be deleted.
If you need the desktop shortcut, run the following command:
<@Magenta>scoop config abgo_bucket_no_shortcut false

download.exist: <@Green>The latest version(<@Magenta>{{ $installed_version }}<@Green>) of <@Magenta>{{ $app[1] }}<@Green> is already installed.
download.download:
Please download manually.
Please input the downloaded file path:
download.no_found: This file is not found, please input again:
download.no_found_app: <@Magenta>{{ $app[1] }}<@Red> was not found, it may not exist or may have spelling errors.

clean_redundant_files: Run a background job: Delete redundant files generated during the installation process.
uninstalling: <@Cyan>Running the built-in uninstaller of this app...
